title: Dragonbane weapons

properties.name: description
properties.value: Dragonbane weapons are a class of weapons that are more effective against draconic creatures than other monsters.

content:
Dragonbane weapons are a class of weapons that are more effective against draconic creatures than other monsters.

Monsters weak to dragonbane weapons are often creatures born from dragonkin experiments, which include:

  • Dragons (excluding Elvarg and revenant dragons)
  • Drakes
  • Hydras
  • Great Olm
  • Wyverns
  • Wyrms

There are two dragonbane weapons currently available to players:

  • Dragon hunter crossbow
  • Dragon hunter lance

See also[edit | edit source]

  • Demonbane weapons
  • Leaf-bladed weapons
  • Silver weaponry
rawContent:
'''Dragonbane weapons''' are a class of weapons that are more effective against [[Draconic (attribute)|draconic creatures]] than other monsters.

Monsters weak to dragonbane weapons are often creatures born from [[dragonkin]] experiments, which include:
*[[Dragon (race)|Dragons]] (excluding [[Elvarg]] and [[revenant dragon]]s)
*[[Drake]]s
*[[Hydra]]s
*[[Great Olm]]
*[[Wyvern]]s
*[[Wyrm]]s

There are two dragonbane weapons currently available to players:
*{{plink|Dragon hunter crossbow}}
*{{plink|Dragon hunter lance}}

==See also==
*[[Demonbane weapons]]
*[[Leaf-bladed weapons]]
*[[Silver weaponry]]

[[Category:Weapon types]]
